amendment.description: To make certain additional funds available for Native American health prevention and treatment programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 416 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 416 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR S4347-4348; text: CR S4347) To make certain additional funds available for Native American health prevention and treatment programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 416 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 416 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Campbell.
